name: alienable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of property or rights) able to be removed or given to someone else: Each object was coded according to whether it was an alienable or an inalienable possession. Their right to the land was alienable.
More examplesFewer examplesExamples of inalienable and alienable possessions are given in the appendix.Their rights to receive payment were alienable.Land ownership is not alienable by individual members of the community.She did not have absolute and alienable rights of ownership.This was not the only form of freely alienable land at the time.
Opposite
inalienable
